content: take on the cold in the style of this crochet hat that features a fancy striped shell design created in red heart super saver stripes double_crochet single_crochet and shell stitches are easy to memorize and the yarn does all the colorwork for you with a generous ribbed fold-over brim this hat is sure to fit snuggly and keep you toasty all winter long materials red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m polo stripe 4960 2 balls or 299 yds/273 5 m size one size to fit adult
